title: A lovers teares: or, The constancy of a yong mans mind, although his choyce be too unkind. All you yong men who heare this ditty, a lovers teares bemoane with pitty. To the tune of Sigh, sob, and weepe.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: for Tho: Lambert, at the sign of the Hors-shoo in Smithfield.,
